net.sf.jclal.activelearning.singlelabel.querystrategy

Class DensityDiversityQueryStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.jclal.activelearning.querystrategy.AbstractQueryStrategy
      • net.sf.jclal.activelearning.singlelabel.querystrategy.AbstractSingleLabelQueryStrategy
        • net.sf.jclal.activelearning.singlelabel.querystrategy.DensityDiversityQueryStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, IConfigure, IQueryStrategy, JCLAL

    public class DensityDiversityQueryStrategy
extends AbstractSingleLabelQueryStrategy
    Implementation of Density Diversity query strategy. The similarity values are pre-computed efficiently. B. Settles and M. Craven. An analysis of active learning strategies for sequence labeling tasks. In Proceedings of the Conference on Empirical Methods in Natural Language Processing (EMNLP), pages 1069â€“1078. ACL Press, 2008.
    Author:
    Oscar Gabriel Reyes Pupo, Eduardo Perez Perdomo
    See Also:

      • configure

        public void configure(org.apache.commons.configuration.Configuration configuration)
        Description copied from interface: IConfigure
        Configuration method.
        Specified by:
        configure in interface IConfigure
        Overrides:
        configure in class AbstractQueryStrategy
        Parameters:
        configuration - Configuration object for density diversity strategy. The XML labels supported are:
        • importance-density= double
        • distance-function type= class

          Package: net.sf.jclal.util.distancefunction

          Class: All

          Package: weka.core

          Class: EuclideanDistance || ManhattanDistance || MinkowskiDistance...

        • matrix-file= boolean
        • sub-query-strategy type= class

          Package: net.sf.jclal.activelearning.querystrategy

          Class: All
